A concise guide to C# Language Features

My first topic is a collection of articles on C# language features. The articles are organized progressively by version release i.e. chronologically and then alphabetically by language feature. The motivation for this C# guide is as follows

  • -To create a consistent and organized reference for C# language features not found elsewhere.

Notes about the code examples within the guide:

  • -Using statements have been omitted for brevity.
  • -Other than the missing using statements and namespace, all code compiles and executes.

World Wide Web has been a fantastic resource for developing this guide. Of particular note are the following sites:

MSDN and Wikipedia.
